data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Concern about possible carcinogenic properties of aspartame was originally raised and popularized in the mainstream media by John Olney in the 1970s and again in 1996 by suggesting that aspartame may be related to brain tumors. Reviews ____ found ____ these ____ were ____, ____ to ____ on ____ ecological ____ and ____ purported ____ of ____ tumors ____ unlikely ____ actually ____ cancer. Independent agencies such as the FDA and National Cancer Institute have reanalyzed multiple studies based on these worries and found no association between aspartame and brain cancer.

Independent agencies such as the FDA and National Cancer Institute have reanalyzed multiple studies based on these worries and found no association between aspartame and brain cancer.
data.answer: 关于阿斯巴甜可能致癌的担忧最初是由约翰·奥尔尼在20世纪70年代在主流媒体上提出并推广的，并在1996年再次提出阿斯巴甜可能与脑瘤有关。评论发现，这些担忧是有缺陷的，因为对生态谬论的依赖和所谓的导致肿瘤的机制实际上不太可能导致癌症。FDA和国家癌症研究所等独立机构基于这些担忧重新分析了多项研究，发现阿斯巴甜和脑癌之间没有关联。
